queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__events_accommodation` ( `id` int(100) NOT NULL auto_increment, `username` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `arrival_date` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `arrival_time` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `arrival_medium` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `departure_date` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `departure_time` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `events` text NOT NULL, `date` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `time` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `notes` text NOT NULL, `banned` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=324 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__events_names` ( `id` int(3) NOT NULL auto_increment, `event_name` varchar(100) default NULL, `event_category` varchar(100) default NULL, `enable` int(1) default NULL, `abstract` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=77 ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__events_registrations` ( `id` int(3) NOT NULL auto_increment, `username` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `college` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `team_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `team_members` int(3) NOT NULL, `team_leader` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `event_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `phone_number` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `abstract` int(1) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=5569 ;
